purpose: Showcase consultation experience transformation - how manual/paper consultations feel impersonal compared to Titanverse-enabled face-to-face human connection, leading to increased uptake.
core_message: Doing a consultation on paper now, it actually feels pretty impersonal. With Titanverse, you're facing your patient, having a real conversation. More personable consultations lead to increased uptake.
summary: 7-slide carousel comparing impersonal paper consultations with personal Titanverse-enabled face-to-face conversations. Slide 1 hooks with impersonal insight. Slides 2-3 show before (manual/paper, typing, impersonal). Slides 4-5 show after (face-to-face, eye contact, natural dialogue). Slide 6 shows outcome (increased uptake). Slide 7 closes with transformation message. Based on early adopter experience demonstrating human connection advantage.
